name: Res ASHP, ICT, Envelope, Precond (EE+DR)
energy_efficiency_source: Determined by custom savings shape information in 'tsv_features'

installed_cost_source.notes: Total installed cost is average of low/high 'ESTAR Connected Thermostat' values plus installed costs for best residential ASHP and for best residential envelope measures (which are converted from $/ft^2 floor to $/unit using unit/cost conversions from ecm_cost_convert.json)

source_data.title: U.S. Department of Energy Commercial Reference Building Models of the National Building Stock
source_data.author: Deru et al. 2011

source_data.title: Grid-Interactive Efficient Building Technology Cost, Performance, and Lifetime Characteristics
source_data.author: Nubbe et al. 2020

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average of low & high values for 'Average Life (yrs.)'

source_data.title: Grid-Interactive Efficient Building Technology Cost, Performance, and Lifetime Characteristics
source_data.author: Nubbe et al. 2020

_description: Highest efficiency residential air source heat pump in 2019 combined with an internet-connected thermostat (ICT), preconditioning, and 6-sided envelope upgrade
